tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CelebritiesFashionChoices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  celebrity_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  outfit_description TEXT,
  date_of_event DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
    celebrity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    profession VARCHAR(50),
    height DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Outfits (
    outfit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    outfit_description VARCHAR(200),
    designer VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (outfit_id, celebrity_id, event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(celebrity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE premieres (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_name VARCHAR(50),
    designer VARCHAR(50),
    premiere_location VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE red_carpet (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_name VARCHAR(50),
    outfit_color VARCHAR(50),
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
    celebrity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR(1),
    age INT,
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CelebOutfit (
    celebrity_id INT,
    outfit_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (celebrity_id, outfit_id, event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(celebrity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (outfit_id) REFERENCES Outfits(outfit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);
